titles.title: I'd Rather Be A Gate Keeper In The House Of The Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I'd rather be a gate keeper in the house of the Lord,
Than to dwell in the tents of the wicked.
(Repeat.)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I'd rather be the way, the truth, and the life,
A gate keeper in the house of the Lord.
That all who come to know me,
Might also know the Father,
And come into the house of the Lord.
